text: Douglas Donato Pereira was a Brazilian drug lord. Pereira was born on May 5, 1991. He was known by the name Dina Terror until his death in a shootout by Brazilian Police. ==Criminal activity== Pereira was known for his drug trade within the favella known as Faz Quem Quer in Northern Rio de Janeiro. His weapon of choice was a 9 milimeter. He became the target of police after he kidnapped and killed an 18 year old. The 18-year-old female, Raianne Dantas de Jesus was a girlfriend of a rival drug dealer. He took on the name the Lord of War, and declared a war on police. He was considered to be a domestic terrorist in Brazil. He was wanted on 10 warrants for his arrest. In March 2016, he was killed by elite Brazilian police. The police force known as Civil police the Coordination of Special Resources (CORE), After the shootout he went over to the Acari Hospital where he died from his wounds. ==References== Category:Drug dealers Category:Brazilian drug traffickers Category:Brazilian mobsters Category:People shot dead by law enforcement officers in Brazil Category:People from Rio de Janeiro (city) Category:20th-century criminals Category:21st-century Brazilian criminals Category:1991 births Category:2016 deaths
title: Douglas Donato Pereira
